transport.question: I have wheels and you sit inside. Vroom vroom! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I take you places!
👪 Many people can fit inside
🚦 You need to wear a seatbelt in me

transport.question: I go on the water and float. I might have sails. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ Some people live on me!
🛥️ I can be big or small.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me in the park!
🔔 I might have a bell!
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Whole families use me

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🎒 I have lots of seats.
🛑 I stop at special places for kids.
🟡 I am a bright color to keep you safe!

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird!
💺 You sit in a seat to ride me.
🌎 I can take you to different countries!

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people. Choo-choo! What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a loud noise when I start.
💺 You can sit and look out the window.
🛤️ I follow a special path.

transport.question: I help people who are hurt and I have a siren. Wee-ooh! Wee-ooh! What am I?

hints.text: 🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚨 I have flashing lights.
🚑 I need to get to the hospital quickly.

transport.question: I carry things, and I'm big! I might carry toys or food. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I have a big space in the back.
🛣️ You see me on the road with other cars.
🚚 I am used to move heavy things from one place to another

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can land on the top of buildings.
🚨 Sometimes I help people in danger.
☀️ You might see me flying over the beach.

transport.question: I have a siren and help put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am big and red.
🔥 I use water to stop the flames.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters ride on me.

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and I'm very colorful. Nemo is one of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have fins!
💧 I live in water.
🌈 I can be orange, blue, or yellow.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and boats float on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have waves.
⚓️ Ships sail on me
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl slowly on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I'm not very fast.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You can find me on the sand.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🖐️ I have many arms to help me.
🪨 I live near rocks.

ocean.question: I make a whooshing sound as I move up and down on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I come from the sea.
⛱️ You can build a sandcastle near me.
🗣️ I say 'whoosh'.

ocean.question: I’m a very big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of sharp teeth.
🦈 People sometimes call me scary.
🌊 I swim very fast.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean. I can sing songs!

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal.
🗣️ I make very loud noises under water.
🐟 I'm much bigger than a fish.

ocean.question: I'm a hard thing you can find on the beach, sometimes with a little animal inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I was once someone's home.
👂 You can hold me to your ear and hear the ocean.
🏖️ I'm found on the sand.

ocean.question: I'm a tiny creature that lives in the ocean and is food for bigger animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🔬 I'm very small.
🦐 Some are pink, some are clear.
🐳 Whales love to eat me.

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that looks like a snake and lives in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don't have fins like other fish.
🕳️ I hide in rocks.
Eel is part of my name.
